info.description: User Management API with JWT Authentication
info.title: User Management API

get.description: Get all apps in the system (Admin privileges required)
Get all boxes in the system (Admin privileges required)
Get all boxes in the system with their online/offline status checked via health check (Admin privileges required)
get.summary: Get all boxes with online/offline status (Admin only)

post.description: Register a new user account with username and password (Admin privileges required). Role can be specified via role_id field. If not provided, defaults to "topic_user".

parameters.description: Registration request (username, password, first_name, last_name, role_id)
parameters.name: request

get.description: Get list of all roles in the system (Admin privileges required)
Get all topics in the system with pagination, search, and filters (Admin privileges required)

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Search term for topic name, description, or creator username
parameters.name: search

post.description: Assign a topic to a user so they can access it (Admin privileges required)

409.description: Conflict: User already assigned to this topic

get.description: Get list of all users assigned to a specific topic (Admin privileges required)
get.summary: Get users assigned to a topic (Admin only)

delete.description: Remove a topic assignment from a user (Admin privileges required)
delete.summary: Remove topic assignment from user (Admin only)

get.description: Get list of all users in the system with pagination and search (Admin privileges required)

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Reset a user's password to a new password specified by admin (Admin privileges required)

get.description: Get all roles assigned to a specific user (Admin privileges required)

post.description: Assign a role to a user (Admin privileges required)

delete.description: Remove a role from a user (Admin privileges required)

put.description: Set the active status of a user account (Admin privileges required)

get.description: Get the API key for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete the API key for the authenticated user

post.description: Generate a new API key for the authenticated user

put.description: Enable or disable the API key for the authenticated user

get.description: Forwards requests to the appropriate platform based on app. Supports Hidemium and GenLogin platforms.
get.summary: Proxy request to anti-detect browser platform

parameters.description: Request body for POST/PUT requests (platform-specific format)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Bad request (invalid path, missing tunnel URL, etc.)

put.description: Forwards requests to the appropriate platform based on app. Supports Hidemium and GenLogin platforms.
put.summary: Proxy request to anti-detect browser platform

parameters.description: Request body for POST/PUT requests (platform-specific format)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Bad request (invalid path, missing tunnel URL, etc.)

post.description: Forwards requests to the appropriate platform based on app. Supports Hidemium and GenLogin platforms.
post.summary: Proxy request to anti-detect browser platform

parameters.description: Request body for POST/PUT requests (platform-specific format)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Bad request (invalid path, missing tunnel URL, etc.)

delete.description: Forwards requests to the appropriate platform based on app. Supports Hidemium and GenLogin platforms.
delete.summary: Proxy request to anti-detect browser platform

parameters.description: Request body for POST/PUT requests (platform-specific format)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Bad request (invalid path, missing tunnel URL, etc.)

get.description: Get all apps belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new anti-detect browser app for the authenticated user

get.description: Check if a tunnel URL is accessible by testing the /user-settings/token endpoint. Returns true if the endpoint is accessible and returns token data.
get.summary: Check if tunnel URL is accessible for Hidemium

get.description: Get subdomain configuration and FRP settings for multiple platforms based on box_id and platform_name (comma-separated)
get.summary: Get subdomain and FRP configuration for app registration

parameters.description: Platform names separated by comma (e.g., hidemium,genlogin,adspower)
parameters.name: platform_name

get.description: Get a specific app by ID (user must own it)

put.description: Update an app (user must own it)

delete.description: Delete an app (user must own it)

post.description: Change the current user's password
Authenticate user with username and password
Logout the current user (revoke refresh token)

get.description: Get current user profile information with roles

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh token

get.description: Get all boxes belonging to the authenticated user with pagination

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new box for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific box by ID (user must own it)

put.description: Update a box name and automatically assign ownership to the current logged-in user

parameters.description: Update box request - name is required
parameters.name: request

delete.description: Delete a box (user must own it)

get.description: Get all apps for a specific box (user must own the box)
Get all files uploaded by the current user

post.description:
Upload one or multiple files to the server. Returns file IDs that can be used in knowledge_files when creating topics.
Supports both single file (form field: "file") and multiple files (form field: "files[]")

get.description:
Download a file by ID. Supports two methods:
1. Authenticated: Requires Bearer token (owner only)
2. Token-based: Use ?token=xxx query param (for automation backend)
Get all Gemini accounts with optional filters (machine_id, is_active, is_locked)
Get all Gemini accounts for a specific machine
get.summary: Get Gemini accounts by machine ID

post.description: Setup a Gemini account (Gmail) on a specific machine for creating Gemini Gems (Admin privileges required)

get.description: Get a specific Gemini account by its ID

put.description: Lock a Gemini account and delete all topics created with it (Admin privileges required)

get.description: Get all topics that were created using a specific Gemini account
get.summary: Get topics by Gemini account ID

put.description: Unlock a previously locked Gemini account (Admin privileges required)

post.description: Kt hp NotebookLM v Gemini: to dn  bng NotebookLM, lu vo folder outlines trong profile, sau  upload file dn  ln Gemini Gem v gi prompt.
post.summary: Generate outline using NotebookLM and upload to Gemini

post.description: Register a new machine or return existing machine info. This is a public endpoint for machines to self-register.

get.description: Get FRP configuration and subdomain for a specific machine by machine_id
get.summary: Get FRP configuration for a machine

post.description: Send heartbeat to update machine status and last seen time

put.description: Update tunnel URL for the machine's Automation app
put.summary: Update tunnel URL for a machine

get.description: Get paginated logs for all entities belonging to the current user
get.summary: Get logs for the current user

post.description: Create a process log entry. Can be called by automation backend via HTTP or RabbitMQ
post.summary: Create a process log (for automation backend)

get.description: Get paginated logs for a specific entity (e.g., topic)
get.summary: Get logs for a specific entity

get.description: Stream real-time logs for a specific entity via SSE. By default, only new logs from connection time are sent. Set history=true to receive all existing logs.

parameters.description: Include existing logs from database (default: false)
parameters.name: history

get.description: Get all topics belonging to the authenticated user with pagination (requires topic_user or topic_creator role)
get.summary: Get all topics for the current user

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 20, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new topic and automatically create a Gem on Gemini

get.description: Get a specific topic by its ID (requires topic_user or topic_creator role and ownership)

put.description: Update a topic's information (requires topic_user or topic_creator role and ownership)

delete.description: Delete a topic by its ID (requires topic_user or topic_creator role and ownership)

get.description: Get a script (projects + edges) for a topic and current user
get.summary: Get a script for a topic

post.description: Save or update a script (projects + edges) for a topic. 1 script = 1 user + 1 topic (1-1 relationship)
post.summary: Save or update a script for a topic

delete.description: Delete a script (projects + edges) for a topic and current user
delete.summary: Delete a script for a topic

post.description: Execute a script by running projects in topological order. Execution is queued and processed asynchronously.

cpu_usage.description: System metrics (updated via heartbeat for load balancing)

error.description:
@Description Error message if tunnel is not accessible
@Example "Connection timeout"

is_accessible.description:
@Description Whether the tunnel URL is accessible
@Example true

message.description:
@Description Status message
@Example "Tunnel is accessible and ready for Hidemium"

topics_count.description: S topics  to trn account ny

models.RegisterAppResponse.description: Response containing subdomain and FRP configuration for app registration

subDomain.description:
@Description Subdomain configuration for the requested platform
@Example {"hidemium": "machineid-hidemium-userid"}

role_id.description: Optional: Role ID to assign to user. If not provided, defaults to "topic_user"

project_id.description: Frontend ID (timestamp) - ch cn field ny

description.example: Ch  v lch s Vit Nam

gemini_account_id.description: Gemini account c dng  to topic ny

description.example: Ch  v lch s Vit Nam

machine_sync_status.description: QUAN TRNG: Track sync status trn tng machine

profile_dir_name.description:
Paths & Directories
Note: UserDataDir khng lu trong DB v path khc nhau trn mi my automation
Automation backend t resolve path: path.join(os.homedir(), 'AppData', 'Local', 'Automation_Profiles')

BearerAuth.description: Enter `Bearer ` followed by your JWT token (e.g. "Bearer <token>") or `ApiKey ` followed by your API key (e.g. "ApiKey <key>")
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
